item.title: EP 332 - Zombie Crime Spree!
item.itunes:title: Zombie Crime Spree!
item.description:
Today we protect our eyes, meet a mysterious man in Germany, and then investigate zombies who are involved in true crime!

Patreon

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

Sundiver’s Debut Album “Orion”  on Spotify!
https://open.spotify.com/album/7Cf75kTvlvIzFZiPYpLHUY?si=vwG7J7G9SwG0EwjvmJiX9Q

 

Parasitic worms found in woman’s eye as scientists warn of ‘emerging’ disease

https://news.yahoo.com/parasitic-worms-found-woman-eye-163709192.html

 

Woman Gets Parasitic Worms in Her Eyes After a Trail Run

https://www.livescience.com/parasitic-eye-worm-trail-run.html

 

Weird Worm Crawling in Oregon Woman's Eye Has Only Been Seen in Cows

https://www.livescience.com/61732-eye-worm-oregon.html

 

Jophar Vorin of Laxaria

https://www.unmyst3.com/2015/12/jophar-vorin-of-laxaria.html

 

Newspaper Clipping of the Day

http://strangeco.blogspot.com/2014/07/newspaper-clipping-of-day.html

 

Jophar Vorin

https://obscurban-legend.fandom.com/wiki/Jophar_Vorin

 

Frankfurt (Oder)

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frankfurt_(Oder)

 

Lloyd's Weekly Newspaper

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lloyd%27s_Weekly_Newspaper

 

Deputies: Man Stabs Woman Over Fear She Would ‘Feed Him To Zombies'

https://detroit.cbslocal.com/2019/10/29/deputies-man-stabs-woman-over-fear-she-would-feed-him-to-zombies/

 

South Carolina Man Allegedly Stabbed Woman Repeatedly Because He Thought She Was 'Trying To Feed Him To Zombies'

https://www.oxygen.com/crime-news/william-berry-29-allegedly-stabbed-woman-over-zombie-fears

 

Woman Claims She Torched 1,665 Hay Bales To Thwart 'Zombie Apocalypse,' Police Say

https://www.oxygen.com/crime-time/monica-berlin-claims-she-torched-hay-bales-thwart-cult-zombie-apocalypse-san-mateo-sheriffs-office

 

Suspected arsonist battled mental illness

https://www.hmbreview.com/news/suspected-arsonist-battled-mental-illness/article_a9a0caa8-8528-11e8-a28b-77e3d7340845.html

 

Alleged arsonist found not competent to stand trial

https://www.hmbreview.com/news/alleged-arsonist-found-not-competent-to-stand-trial/article_6411424c-c74a-11e8-872f-1b17d6ed769d.html

El Granada woman pleads not guilty to alleged arson

https://www.hmbreview.com/news/police_log/el-granada-woman-pleads-not-guilty-to-alleged-arson/article_f3f7afc8-8d5f-11e9-860e-2f86b6fded81.html

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

 

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Dead Rabbit Skull By John from the SCAR Group

 

Halloween Monster By Finn

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2019
